void restore (bool bSuggest=false)
 Restores the default script If this function is suggested by KVIrc, the default script will be wiped out and then it will be reloaded. Otherwise, when the user wants to restore it, he can choose which part of the default script have to be restored This is an external helper to the real function.

Detailed Description

The manager who handles the restoring of the default script.

void KviDefaultScriptManager::restore ( bool  bSuggest = false  ) 

Restores the default script If this function is suggested by KVIrc, the default script will be wiped out and then it will be reloaded. Otherwise, when the user wants to restore it, he can choose which part of the default script have to be restored This is an external helper to the real function.

Returns:
void

References __tr2qs, compareVersions(), KviApp::DefScript, g_pApp, KviApp::getGlobalKvircDirectory(), m_bNoNeedToRestore, m_pDialog, restoreInternal(), and KviMessageBox::warning().
